Sky is Blite,
no Clouds today

The embedded NoSQL database for .NET.
Zero allocation, local-first, cloud-free.

Get Started
Quick Start
dotnet add package BLite

using BLite.Core;

var db = new DocumentDb("mydb.blite");
var users = db.GetCollection<User>();
users.Insert(new User { Name = "Alice" });

Spatial Indexing

Embedded First

No server. No cloud. Add BLite via NuGet and get a full embedded NoSQL database living inside your .NET process ‚Äî zero latency, zero dependencies.

üîå

Schema-less API

BLiteEngine + DynamicCollection for schema-less BSON queries. No compile-time types needed ‚Äî same kernel, same performance.

BLite Studio

Official cross-platform GUI to browse, query and manage your embedded NoSQL databases. Available for Windows, Linux and macOS.
